ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Question on Loot and Classes
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering why the rogue would think he needed the EBW as well.  Since its No drop he can t sell it.  My rogue used 1 HS weapons for completeness, but
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering why the rogue would think he needed the EBW as well. Since
its No drop he can't sell it. My rogue used 1 HS weapons for completeness,
but only until he got Backstab. Since then I don't think I've even touched
the FS Scimitar in the bank. Very odd. Are the fangs not No Drop as well?

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 9:21 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question on Loot and Classes


Hi Adam,

While I will no longer be playing EverQuest I would have to say that your
Rogue is being a bit silly. There is no need for a Rogue to get an EBW.
They are far better off using the awesome piercing weapons that rogues get.
Giving an EBW to a Rogue is silly. I personally feel they should not be
able to use the EBW.

Before anyone wonders, yes, I play a rogue as well. We get far superior
pierce items to the EBW within the game and the EBW is much better suited
for warriors, rangers and bards.

Sure Rogues get DW and DA. But I strongly feel that any rogue that uses
anything except pierce weapons needs to re-consider their class choice.

Thieves do not run around lugging swords. Nor do assassins.

Tryxie
Spy, Fist of Innoruk

aka:

Lyrnia Jongleur, Bard of Norrath

PS:

I sure hope Verant takes that stupid line out of the EULA soon. I miss
playing but I refuse to pay for a game that will snoop around on my hard
drive and upload information across the internet.

> Last night I ended up camping the maid and butler in MM. Our severely
> overpowered group consisted of 2 bards (35), 1 rogue (35), 1 warrior (35),
1
> druid (35) and 1 shaman (33). During the night we were fortunate to see
the
> Butler once, and he actually had the fang for us. I didn't win the lotto.
:┬¼
> (
>
> Anyway, our rogue said that he needed the EBW too. I was wondering what
all
> of your opinions on the matter were. I would love some ammo for my side of
> the argument that there are other things he should be going after. Of
> course, if I'm wrong, then I guess that means I'll be in MM a looooooong
> time.
>
> *does some quick math, 4 x 4 = 16.*
>
> Eep, we need 8 fangs as a group?
>
> *runs off to cry*
>
> Draelon Stormsong
>
>
